title: American Money Has Discovered Indian Cricket
description: Billion-dollar investment funds and N.F.L. ownership groups are among those angling for a foothold in the Indian Premier League. The returns, not the sport, are the draw.
dc:creator: Mike Jakeman

media:content.media:description: The Mumbai Indians are five-time champions of the Indian Premier League.
